fulltext:
LEVANSON
SOFTWAREENGINEER
PROFILE
I have more one years of working experience in front-end web development position and knowledge of Agile
methodology. I work carefully for each assigned task as well as good teamwork. Beside that, I am able to work
under pressure and deadlines. Always willing to learn new things and improve myself. I also love travelling,
camping and trekking.
EXPERIENCE
FRONT-END DEV
Jan 01 - May 31 2019
KMS Technology | PNJ
Develop features like filterHomePage, cartPage,
buyNow, pre-order, textEditor for PNJ Watch, which was
an eCommerce website selling watch; include admin
and customer site.
*https://pnjwatch.com.vn
technologies used:
Client site: react, redux, redux-saga, styled-component,
18n, AntDesign
Server site: .Net core 2.2, SQL server
FRONT-END DEV
Oct 05 - Dec 30 2018
KMS Technology | Izenda BI Platform
Maintenance a web Busines Intelligent platform over 3
years old. Main responsibility is solved bugs, cover
Front-end unit test, converted component is written by
modules.
The Reports allow user to select data sources and build
data visualizations of user's data in containers. Assem-
ble of Reports called by Dashboard.
technologies used:
- Client site: react (ver 15.x), mobx, blue bird, Sass.
- Server site: .Net core 2.0, SQL server.
FRONT-END DEV
2018
KMS Technology 
| HotSchedules
Maintain and develop features on Recipes
module (one of the modules web Restaurant Platform).
It's splitted from Inventory module, knowing the items
make up a particular dish and displaying on the echo
table. After setting up, Recipes can be linked to different
menu items on the point of sale system.
technologies used:
- Client site: react, redux, redux-observable, echo
- Server site: nodeJs, mongoDB
FRONT-END DEV
Sep 05 - Mar 01
2017 - 2018
KMS Technology | Revegy
Covered Front-end unit test up to 5%, fix bugs and
developed features like PieChart, Responsive UI,
CardLegend on smart sales web application.
Visualizing user's data to table or chart, creating
plans to reach those potential customers.
technologies used:
- Client site: ember, any chart, boostrap 4
Server site: java, My SQL
EDUCATION
BACHELOR OF COMPUTER SCIENCE
Sep 2017
TON DUC THANG University
major ex.
Base programming, Algorithm, Data Structure v..v
SKILLS
Languages & Scripting
Javascript
CSS3
HTM L5
Methodology
Agile
Frameworks
React
Redux
REFERENCES
Quan Truong | Senior Software Engineer at KMS Technology
+84779945042 skype: kiokamaken
Huyen Do | Senior Quality Assurance at KMS Technology
+84918373344 | skype: huyen.do.le
